entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
